markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Divine Grace](/Feats.aspx?ID=5892) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 94 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Trigger**
You attempt a save against a spell, but you haven’t rolled yet.

</column>

---

You call upon your deity's grace, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to the save.
name: Divine Grace
